name: The Fuzzy Infringement
description: The 2nd piece in Vol.2 of "Fuzzy Masterpieces". We have grown accustomed to enjoying the world's masterpieces from afar, behind glass or ropes, so we have forgotten that there are other sensory experiences to them like touch. I created "Fuzzy Masterpieces" with this idea in mind. To evoke the desire to touch these pieces, to run your virtual hands through all their fuzzy glory and enjoy enjoy them as wonderfully furry works of art. SEE DESCRIPTION HERE: https://www.instagram.com/p/COQvpe6HytQ/
